member.name: T:ESolve.Entities.DataManager.ClassManager
member.summary:
The main Math class. Contains all methods for performing basic math functions.
Add -> Adding new Class object into Database. See to add new Class.
Delete -> Deleting existing Class from Database. See to remove existing Class.
Get
Get Class from Database based on passed Id. See in order to get Class by Id.
Unique name Check if Class name in use.
Add array of classes. Add passed array of classes.
Update array of classes. Update passed array of classes. If in array is class which is not in database, it will be added.
ComboValues -> Get all classes from Database in Id Name model. See to see combovalues.
